channel.title: CVE Feed for Kron -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kron -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-44793|2024-09-17T04:10:26.927Z -- kron -- single%20connect
item.description: Single Connect does not perform an authorization check when using the sc-reports-ui" module. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to access the device configuration page and export the data to an external file. The exploitation of this vulnerability might allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information including the database credentials. Since the database runs with high privileges it is possible to execute commands with the attained credentials.

item.title: CVE-2021-44795|2024-09-17T00:40:52.613Z -- kron -- single%20connect
item.description: Single Connect does not perform an authorization check when using the "sc-assigned-credential-ui" module. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to modify users permissions. The exploitation of this vulnerability might allow a remote attacker to delete permissions from other users without authenticating.

item.title: CVE-2021-44792|2024-09-17T03:38:14.900Z -- kron -- single%20connect
item.description: Single Connect does not perform an authorization check when using the "log-monitor" module. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to access the logging interface. The exploitation of this vulnerability might allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information.
